message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.HC

Reasoning: 
- cs.CL (Computation and Language) is the most likely category as the paper deals with translation technologies and matching algorithms used in Translation Memory systems. 
- cs.IR (Information Retrieval) is also likely as the paper evaluates the effectiveness of different matching algorithms in retrieving translations from a bank of available translations. 
- cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) is another possible category as the paper discusses the use of algorithms in Translation Memory systems. 
- cs.LG (Machine Learning) is a possible category as the paper mentions the use of crowdsourcing and a new algorithm based on weighted n-gram precision. 
- cs.HC (Human-Computer Interaction) is also a possible category as the paper evaluates the effectiveness of the matching algorithms based on human judgments of helpfulness.
